name: 幼丝虫
description: 总是在树叶间蠕动的小虫子，能吐出粘性极强的丝线。进化后会发生惊人的蜕变。

features: 头顶有触角能感知危险

image_prompts.design: A small caterpillar with soft green body and yellow ring patterns. Antennae on head sense danger, tail can produce silk. Low poly style with faceted geometric surfaces, sharp edges on body segments, ink sketch texture on ring patterns, non-reflective surface with matte green and yellow tones, cute and vulnerable.
